docs.lead_paragraph: GREAT SWINDLE.--ARREST AND RECOVERY OF THE MONEY.--On the 17th inst., C. H. SMITH, who has figured as President of the Buckeye Health Association, received through the Post-office, a letter directed to C. H. SMITH, woolbuyer, announcing that a package of $3,000 had been forwarded by express from Troy, to the office in this city.

headline.main: LATER FROM HAVANA.; Santa Anna on his Way to Mexico.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U. S. M. steamship Empire City, Capt. WENDEE, arrived at this port on Sunday afternoon from New-Orleans, having touched at Havana, and sailed thence at 8 o'clock, on the 29th ult.
docs.snippet: The U. S. M. steamship Empire City, Capt. WENDEE, arrived at this port on Sunday afternoon from New-Orleans, having touched at Havana, and sailed thence at 8 o'clock, on the 29th ult.

docs.lead_paragraph: Whatever doubts may have oppressed the minds of the worthy but suffering citizens of New-York as to the existence of one HENRY ARCULARIUS, they have been forever dispelled by the unexpected appearance of that individual at the Municipal Reform Meeting, held in Tammany Hall on last Thursday evening.

docs.lead_paragraph: REESE's Medical Gazette, for April, contains two successful cases of double amputation of the inferior extremity in each case, performed while the patient was under the influence of chloroform, and in immediate succession.
docs.snippet: REESE's Medical Gazette, for April, contains two successful cases of double amputation of the inferior extremity in each case, performed while the patient was under the influence of chloroform, and in immediate succession.

docs.lead_paragraph: EX-PRESIDENT FILLMORE.--Among the news items crowded out of our columns yesterday morning was an account of the arrival of Mr. FILLMORE in our City on Thursday, by the Camden and Amboy Railroad. The ex-President was accompanied by his son and daughter, Mr. and Mrs. HEMENWAY, and Mr. POWERS, who was in charge of the remains of Mrs. FILLMORE.

docs.lead_paragraph: As I sit down to my letter, the sun comes gently through the window, mildly demanding an apology for the hard words I have had to say this Winter of Paris weather. I make it willingly. For the last few days we have enjoyed a temperature and atmosphere, that we might he thankful for in May.
